item.description:
Seven states have passed resolutions urging Congress to protect our civil liberties and amend the USA PATRIOT Act. Will Massachusetts be next?

House Bill 1881 is now before the Joint Committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security. They're holding a public hearing on Wednesday, June 22nd. Come show your support for this resolution, and bring people with you!

Hearing on civil liberties resolution
Wednesday, June 22nd, 10am-1pm
State House hearing room A-2

T to Park Street, walk across the Common to the State House, and ask the guards at the door for directions to the hearing rooms. Arrive early if you want to testify.

For more information, see http://aclu-mass.org/...
item.name: Public hearing on civil liberties resolution @State House
